00026 #ifndef YA_MDS_REDUCE_H
00027 #define YA_MDS_REDUCE_H
00028 
00029 YALANAMESPACE
00030 
00032 template<class eltype>
00033 class YAMDSReduce : public YADimReduce<eltype> {
00034  public:
00035   YAMDSReduce() {}
00036   ~YAMDSReduce() {};
00037 
00039   const string method_name() const {
00040   return "Multidimensional Scaling"; }
00041   
00043   const string method_id() const {
00044   return "MDS"; }
00045 
00047   const string version() const {
00048   return "0.1"; }
00049 
00051 
00054   template <class ya_type1, class ya_type2>
00055   int find_map(const ya_type1 &input, ya_type2 &output, ya_sizet dim,
00056                EigenOptions &eigopts);
00057 
00059   template <class ya_type1, class ya_type2>
00060   void forward_map(const ya_type1 &input, ya_type2 &output) const {
00061     cerr << "Forward map is not implemented for MDS.\n"; exit(1);
00062   }
00063   
00065   template <class ya_type1, class ya_type2>
00066   void reverse_map(const ya_type1 &input, ya_type2 &output) const {
00067     cerr << "Forward map is not implemented for MDS.\n"; exit(1);
00068   }
00069 
00071 
00074   int find(const YA_MatT &input, YA_MatT &output, ya_sizet dim,
00075            EigenOptions &eigopts) {
00076     return find_map(input,output,dim,eigopts);
00077   }
00079   void forward(const YA_MatT &input, 
00080              YA_MatT &output) const {
00081   forward_map(input,output); }
00083   void reverse(const YA_MatT &input, 
00084              YA_MatT &output) const {
00085   reverse_map(input,output); }
00086   
00087   using YADimReduce<eltype>::load_map;
00088   using YADimReduce<eltype>::save_map;
00090   void save_map(ostream &out) const {}
00092   int load_map(istream &in) { return 0; }
00093 
00094  private:
00095   YA_MatT eigen_vectors;
00096 };
00097 
00098 }
